data.text: Why!? Spe-chan, why!?
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: 󠁿Why!? Spe-chan, why!?

data.text:
I've been looking forward to this for so long! 
To being able to seriously face Spe-chan today!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
󠁿I've been looking forward to this for so long! 
󠁿To being able to seriously face Spe-chan today!

data.text:
Since we weren't able to run together this whole time, 
I was looking forward to it……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
󠁿Since we weren't able to run together this whole time, 
󠁿I was looking forward to it……

data.text: Even then, what the heck was that run!?
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: 󠁿Even then, what the heck was that run!?

data.text: If you don't feel like running, then don't enter a race!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: 󠁿If you don't feel like running, then don't enter a race!

data.text:
The first race of autumn, the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, 
ended with Special Week's worst record so far, 7th place.
data.processed:
󠁿The first race of autumn, the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, 
󠁿ended with Special Week's worst record so far, 7th place.

data.text:
It was a completely different run from what I had seen so far―― 
it was almost like she had lost her reason to run.
data.processed:
󠁿It was a completely different run from what I had seen so far―― 
󠁿it was almost like she had lost her reason to run.

data.text:
The shock of losing to Grass Wonder being the sole 
reason doesn't make sense. While I was thinking 
about why her mental state would be so poor――
data.processed:
󠁿The shock of losing to Grass Wonder being the sole 
󠁿reason doesn't make sense. While I was thinking 
󠁿about why her mental state would be so poor――

data.text: (Riiiiiiing Riiiiiiing)
data.processed: 󠁿(Riiiiiiing Riiiiiiing)

data.text: 『Hello, Trainer-san……？』
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿『Hello, Trainer-san……？』

data.text: I'm sorry for calling you so late at night……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿I'm sorry for calling you so late at night……

data.text:
『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. 
Over here it's just past noon.』
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. 
󠁿Over here it's just past noon.』

data.text:
『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. 
Over here it's just past noon.』
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. 
󠁿Over here it's just past noon.』

data.text:
Ah…… there's a time difference. 
I still can't get used to it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Ah…… there's a time difference. 
󠁿I still can't get used to it.

data.text: Anyways, um…… I saw Spe-chan's race.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Anyways, um…… I saw Spe-chan's race.

data.text:
The results of the 『Kyoto Daishoten』 were probably on her mind, 
to the point where she'd call even when it was late over there.
data.processed:
󠁿The results of the 『Kyoto Daishoten』 were probably on her mind, 
󠁿to the point where she'd call even when it was late over there.

data.text:
『Spe-chan running while looking so lost, 
that's the first time I've seen that』
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿『Spe-chan running while looking so lost, 
󠁿that's the first time I've seen that』

data.text:
Me too. There were also times during training where it 
seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Me too. There were also times during training where it 
󠁿seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――

data.text:
Me too. There were also times during training where it 
seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Me too. There were also times during training where it 
󠁿seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――

data.text:
I couldn't figure out why she was so depressed…… Silence Suzuka 
remained silent and listened while I told her the situation.
data.processed:
󠁿I couldn't figure out why she was so depressed…… Silence Suzuka 
󠁿remained silent and listened while I told her the situation.

data.text:
……Me too, I've had lots of times where I was lost like that. 
Times where I couldn't run like I wanted, times I couldn't get 
the results expected of me……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿……Me too, I've had lots of times where I was lost like that. 
󠁿Times where I couldn't run like I wanted, times I couldn't get 
󠁿the results expected of me……

data.text:
But, whenever that happened Trainer-san's straight-forward 
words were what supported me and kept me moving forward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿But, whenever that happened Trainer-san's straight-forward 
󠁿words were what supported me and kept me moving forward.

data.text:
『It's probably unfitting for a Trainer to say this, but forget 
about victory and just run as you desire』…… I remember being 
saved by those words.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿『It's probably unfitting for a Trainer to say this, but forget 
󠁿about victory and just run as you desire』…… I remember being 
󠁿saved by those words.

data.text:
That's why, before you're lost too, Trainer-san, 
please go tell Spe-chan your honest thoughts.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, before you're lost too, Trainer-san, 
󠁿please go tell Spe-chan your honest thoughts.

data.text:
Trainer-san is always thinking about us before anything else. 
That's something we understand better than anyone else.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san is always thinking about us before anything else. 
󠁿That's something we understand better than anyone else.

data.text:
My…… honest thoughts. 
The words I need to tell Special Week――
data.processed:
󠁿My…… honest thoughts. 
󠁿The words I need to tell Special Week――

data.text:
My…… honest thoughts. 
The words I need to tell Special Week――
data.processed:
󠁿My…… honest thoughts. 
󠁿The words I need to tell Special Week――

data.text: What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?
data.processed: 󠁿What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?

data.text: What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?
data.processed: 󠁿What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?

data.text: She's always overflowing with liveliness――
data.processed: 󠁿She's always overflowing with liveliness――

data.text: When it comes to running, she's genuine and earnest――
data.processed: 󠁿When it comes to running, she's genuine and earnest――

data.text: She's always straight-forwardly chasing her dreams――
data.processed: 󠁿She's always straight-forwardly chasing her dreams――

data.text: "Japan's #1"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿"Japan's #1"……

data.text: Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?

data.text: ……I see, so that's what it is……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿……I see, so that's what it is……

data.text:
I still don't know why she's started feeling that way. 
But, the words Special Week said――
data.processed:
󠁿I still don't know why she's started feeling that way. 
󠁿But, the words Special Week said――

data.text:
I didn't realize it at the time but, 
it may have continued on just like this……
data.processed:
󠁿I didn't realize it at the time but, 
󠁿it may have continued on just like this……

data.text:
"Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume, and then what, 
is there any meaning in that?"――
data.processed:
󠁿"Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume, and then what, 
󠁿is there any meaning in that?"――

data.text: 『Um……Trainer-san……?』
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿『Um……Trainer-san……?』

data.text: Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!
data.name: <username>

choices.text: I'm heading over to where Spe is!
I'm heading over to where Spe is!

data.processed: 󠁿Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!

data.text: Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!
data.name: <username>

choices.text: I'm heading over to where Spe is!
I'm heading over to where Spe is!

data.processed: 󠁿Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!

data.text: 『……Okay, take care of Spe-chan』
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿『……Okay, take care of Spe-chan』

data.text:
Normally, lots of Uma Musume would be working hard at training 
right now but, it was heavily raining on the course, so there 
weren't many there today.
data.processed:
󠁿Normally, lots of Uma Musume would be working hard at training 
󠁿right now but, it was heavily raining on the course, so there 
󠁿weren't many there today.

data.text:
The course was dead quiet―― she wasn't running, 
she was just standing there at one end.
data.processed:
󠁿The course was dead quiet―― she wasn't running, 
󠁿she was just standing there at one end.

data.text: Spe……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Spe……

data.text: Trainer-san……？
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san……？

data.text:
By the looks of it, you haven't run at all yet, huh? 
But, well, the course is in pretty bad condition.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿By the looks of it, you haven't run at all yet, huh? 
󠁿But, well, the course is in pretty bad condition.

data.text:
Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 
Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 
󠁿Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?

data.text:
Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 
Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 
󠁿Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?

data.text:
……Yeah, it's hard. It's so far away, 
almost like a mirage……but I don't know anymore……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……Yeah, it's hard. It's so far away, 
󠁿almost like a mirage……but I don't know anymore……

data.text:
At the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 seeing everyone's smiling faces, 
thinking that beyond that was the "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" goal 
that I was aiming for.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿At the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 seeing everyone's smiling faces, 
󠁿thinking that beyond that was the "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" goal 
󠁿that I was aiming for.

data.text:
But it was just a feeling, that making a lot of people happy and 
smiling, that becoming that kind of Uma Musume might be it……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿But it was just a feeling, that making a lot of people happy and 
󠁿smiling, that becoming that kind of Uma Musume might be it……

data.text:
But, I didn't have anywhere near enough 
strength to become "Japan's #1"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿But, I didn't have anywhere near enough 
󠁿strength to become "Japan's #1"……

data.text: On top of that, even if I did eventually become "Japan's #1"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿On top of that, even if I did eventually become "Japan's #1"……

data.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed: 󠁿I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.

data.text:
After the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, the reaction 
to "Japan's #1" was disappointment……and resignation.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿After the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, the reaction 
󠁿to "Japan's #1" was disappointment……and resignation.

data.text:
That "Japan's #1" could only make it so far…… 
those words of resignation.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿That "Japan's #1" could only make it so far…… 
󠁿those words of resignation.

data.text:
I'm still so far away from becoming #1 in Japan, 
what was I thinking……I tried not thinking about 
it and working hard, I tried but――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿I'm still so far away from becoming #1 in Japan, 
󠁿what was I thinking……I tried not thinking about 
󠁿it and working hard, I tried but――

data.text:
I still end up thinking it…… Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
what meaning is there in that?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿I still end up thinking it…… Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
󠁿what meaning is there in that?

data.text:
……Everything I've done up until now, was there any meaning in it? 
Running from now on, will there be any meaning in that either……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……Everything I've done up until now, was there any meaning in it? 
󠁿Running from now on, will there be any meaning in that either……?

data.text:
Her own defeats, giving up on her overseas challenge, 
and then her friend's narrow defeat――
data.processed:
󠁿Her own defeats, giving up on her overseas challenge, 
󠁿and then her friend's narrow defeat――

data.text:
With so many things happening back-to-back, even 
though she was chasing her dream, her feelings 
led to her becoming lost. In that case――
data.processed:
󠁿With so many things happening back-to-back, even 
󠁿though she was chasing her dream, her feelings 
󠁿led to her becoming lost. In that case――

data.text:
When I first met that Uma Musume, 
I thought she seemed really unreliable.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿When I first met that Uma Musume, 
󠁿I thought she seemed really unreliable.

data.text: Eh……？
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
But, at the same time, I thought she was 
someone who I could have high expectations for.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿But, at the same time, I thought she was 
󠁿someone who I could have high expectations for.

data.text:
She had just come from Hokkaido, 
and she wasn't used to races yet――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿She had just come from Hokkaido, 
󠁿and she wasn't used to races yet――

data.text:
But, she was always chasing her dreams with all she had. 
Just watching her raised even my spirits.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿But, she was always chasing her dreams with all she had. 
󠁿Just watching her raised even my spirits.

data.text:
Almost like the protagonist of a story. Without losing hope, she 
would overcome any hardship and move forward, and before I knew 
it, I was drawn in……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Almost like the protagonist of a story. Without losing hope, she 
󠁿would overcome any hardship and move forward, and before I knew 
󠁿it, I was drawn in……

data.text:
……Spe, just a little while ago you asked if there 
was any meaning in what you've done, but――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿……Spe, just a little while ago you asked if there 
󠁿was any meaning in what you've done, but――

data.text:
What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, 
these hopes, and these dreams.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, 
󠁿these hopes, and these dreams.

data.text:
What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, 
these hopes, and these dreams.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, 
󠁿these hopes, and these dreams.

data.text:
I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and 
always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream 
together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and 
󠁿always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream 
󠁿together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.

data.text:
I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and 
always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream 
together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and 
󠁿always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream 
󠁿together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.

data.text: "Japan's #1" that you want to see their dream together with……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿"Japan's #1" that you want to see their dream together with……

data.text:
"Japan's #1"―― those words came out unconsciously. 
But those words seemed strangely fitting.
data.processed:
󠁿"Japan's #1"―― those words came out unconsciously. 
󠁿But those words seemed strangely fitting.

data.text: That's right……there's not only one meaning, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿That's right……there's not only one meaning, Spe.

data.text:
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume", there's not only one correct meaning, 
there's probably as many meanings as people watching you, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿"Japan's #1 Uma Musume", there's not only one correct meaning, 
󠁿there's probably as many meanings as people watching you, Spe.

data.text: As many meanings as people watching me……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿As many meanings as people watching me……

data.text:
And because there is no correct answer, 
it can keep transforming.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿And because there is no correct answer, 
󠁿it can keep transforming.

data.text:
For example, that feeling of resignation 
for "Japan's #1" that Spe saw――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿For example, that feeling of resignation 
󠁿for "Japan's #1" that Spe saw――

data.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed: 󠁿I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.

data.text:
Winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, that 
kind of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". Spe, depending on your efforts, 
it can change to that!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, that 
󠁿kind of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". Spe, depending on your efforts, 
󠁿it can change to that!

data.text:
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" has many forms to it, there was meaning 
to it, everything you did had a proper meaning to it――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" has many forms to it, there was meaning 
󠁿to it, everything you did had a proper meaning to it――

data.text: Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text:
……any form of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"…… 
……Ah.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……any form of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"…… 
󠁿……Ah.

data.text: What kind of Uma Musume is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"?
data.name: Young Spe
data.processed: 󠁿What kind of Uma Musume is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"?

data.text:
Well, let's see……maybe an Uma Musume that runs with everything 
they've got, and is still energetic even after crossing the goal.
data.name: Spe's Mom
data.processed:
󠁿Well, let's see……maybe an Uma Musume that runs with everything 
󠁿they've got, and is still energetic even after crossing the goal.

data.text: Is that really "Japan's #1"……?
data.name: Young Spe
data.processed: 󠁿Is that really "Japan's #1"……?

data.text: Yeah, at least that's what Mom thinks!
data.name: Spe's Mom
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, at least that's what Mom thinks!

data.text:
But, don't you think there's a lot more? 
Types of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I mean.
data.name: Spe's Mom
data.processed:
󠁿But, don't you think there's a lot more? 
󠁿Types of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I mean.

data.text: Like what?
data.name: Young Spe
data.processed: 󠁿Like what?

data.text: Hmm, let's see, like maybe the most famous in Japan――
data.name: Spe's Mom
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm, let's see, like maybe the most famous in Japan――

data.text:
……That's right, my mom said that. 
To my mom, "Japan's #1" meant……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……That's right, my mom said that. 
󠁿To my mom, "Japan's #1" meant……

data.text:
Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean 
many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to 
see their dream together with.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean 
󠁿many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to 
󠁿see their dream together with.

data.text:
Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean 
many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to 
see their dream together with.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean 
󠁿many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to 
󠁿see their dream together with.

data.text: Trainer-san……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san……!

data.text: Special Week looked at me with wide eyes.
data.processed: 󠁿Special Week looked at me with wide eyes.

data.text:
Those eyes seemed teary, but they also 
seemed to be filled with fire――
data.processed:
󠁿Those eyes seemed teary, but they also 
󠁿seemed to be filled with fire――

data.text:
『Fall Tenno Sho』, 『Japan Cup』, and 『Arima Kinen』, 
and anything that comes after, I want to see 
all of those dreams together with Spe……!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿『Fall Tenno Sho』, 『Japan Cup』, and 『Arima Kinen』, 
󠁿and anything that comes after, I want to see 
󠁿all of those dreams together with Spe……!

data.text:
That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make 
everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To 
everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make 
󠁿everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To 
󠁿everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――

data.text:
That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make 
everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To 
everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make 
󠁿everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To 
󠁿everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――

data.text:
……! Yeah!! 
I'll keep running, and then――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……! Yeah!! 
󠁿I'll keep running, and then――

data.text: I'll aim to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" for everyone!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿I'll aim to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" for everyone!

data.text: Hey, hey, hey, are ya plannin' on runnin' in all this mud?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: 󠁿Hey, hey, hey, are ya plannin' on runnin' in all this mud?

data.text:
Fufuu……if you'd like, 
how about letting us join in?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu……if you'd like, 
󠁿how about letting us join in?

data.text: Rice will chase after Spe-san, okay……!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Rice will chase after Spe-san, okay……!

data.text: Let's do our best, Spe-chan!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: 󠁿Let's do our best, Spe-chan!

data.text: E-everyone……!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿E-everyone……!?

data.text:
Alright, let's start training! 
Run your heart out, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, let's start training! 
󠁿Run your heart out, Spe!

data.text:
Alright, let's start training! 
Run your heart out, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, let's start training! 
󠁿Run your heart out, Spe!

data.text: Yeah! I'll be off!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah! I'll be off!!

data.text:
It's finally here, Autumn's biggest, the 『Fall Tenno Sho』! 
This year there are a lot of big names too!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿It's finally here, Autumn's biggest, the 『Fall Tenno Sho』! 
󠁿This year there are a lot of big names too!

data.text:
With two Classic crowns, Seiun Sky, 
and someone who fought hard alongside her, King Halo!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿With two Classic crowns, Seiun Sky, 
󠁿and someone who fought hard alongside her, King Halo!

data.text:
Fighting her way up through several veterans to make it this far, 
Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi, and trying to put a stop to the "Golden 
Generation", Mejiro Bright!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿Fighting her way up through several veterans to make it this far, 
󠁿Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi, and trying to put a stop to the "Golden 
󠁿Generation", Mejiro Bright!

data.text:
And finally, the one who conquered the 『Spring 
Tenno Sho』, Special Week, attempting to obtain 
both the Spring and Fall consecutively!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿And finally, the one who conquered the 『Spring 
󠁿Tenno Sho』, Special Week, attempting to obtain 
󠁿both the Spring and Fall consecutively!

data.text:
A once in a century battle between Japan's most accomplished competitors! 
Which Uma Musume will stand at the top!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿A once in a century battle between Japan's most accomplished competitors! 
󠁿Which Uma Musume will stand at the top!?

data.text: Spe-chan.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: 󠁿Spe-chan.

data.text: Ah, Tsuru-chan……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, Tsuru-chan……!

data.text:
……I'm sorry about last time. 
It can't be helped that Tsuru-chan was mad after I ran like that.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿……I'm sorry about last time. 
󠁿It can't be helped that Tsuru-chan was mad after I ran like that.

data.text:
But today, I'm fine. I promise I definitely won't 
disappoint you with that kind of run this time.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿But today, I'm fine. I promise I definitely won't 
󠁿disappoint you with that kind of run this time.

data.text:
……Ehehe, those eyes. Those are the eyes of the Derby 
Uma Musume, the one I've wanted to battle the most 
in Japan, the Spe-chan I've been chasing.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
󠁿……Ehehe, those eyes. Those are the eyes of the Derby 
󠁿Uma Musume, the one I've wanted to battle the most 
󠁿in Japan, the Spe-chan I've been chasing.

data.text: I'm looking forward to it! Let's give it everything we've got!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: 󠁿I'm looking forward to it! Let's give it everything we've got!

data.text: Yeah! I'll do my best, and give it my all!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah! I'll do my best, and give it my all!

data.text:
And now they've reached the straight! On the inside, King Halo 
pushes through! Taking the outside, Seiun Sky moves forward!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿And now they've reached the straight! On the inside, King Halo 
󠁿pushes through! Taking the outside, Seiun Sky moves forward!

data.text:
But from even further outside comes Special Week! 
Special Week chases, surging forward!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿But from even further outside comes Special Week! 
󠁿Special Week chases, surging forward!

data.text: Daaaaaaa～～～～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Daaaaaaa～～～～!!

data.text:
Special Week! Special Week! 
Special Week, at the end takes the lead and 1st place!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿Special Week! Special Week! 
󠁿Special Week, at the end takes the lead and 1st place!

data.text:
Special Week is truly strong! She splendidly obtains 
consecutive wins in the Spring and Fall 『Tenno Sho』!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿Special Week is truly strong! She splendidly obtains 
󠁿consecutive wins in the Spring and Fall 『Tenno Sho』!

data.text:
With a winning time of 1 minute and 58 seconds! Victory with a 
record time! In a stunning comeback from the last race, she 
successfully turns it around!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿With a winning time of 1 minute and 58 seconds! Victory with a 
󠁿record time! In a stunning comeback from the last race, she 
󠁿successfully turns it around!
